name: MSLogin-Form
summary: MSLogin-Form is a library for those who need to build a form into their application in a simple way.
description:
MSLogin-Form was developed by a student of Control and Automation Engineer that have been working with iOS applications for 1,5 year. 
Feeling the necessity to have a form in all applications that he worked, this library was build for those who need a form into their application.
It also has a controller class for login that handle inputs from user and enables or not the login button based on an email address and the password length.
It's easy to setup and you can find it on the example.
